it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities

Class RSAEncryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.GenericEntity
      • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.RSAEncryption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity(name="Encryption_keys")
public class RSAEncryption
extends GenericEntity
    This JPA class represent a RSA key pair, associated to a specific device in order to encrypt and decrypt sensible data sent through internet connectivity
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • encryptPassword

                                               java.security.PublicKey publicKey)
                                        throws EncryptionFailedException
        Encrypts a password using RSA public key
        Parameters:
        plainPassword - password to be encrypted
        publicKey - public key used in order to encrypt the password
        Returns:
        the encrypted password
        Throws:
        EncryptionFailedException - if the given encryptedPassword can't be encrypted

      • setUpCypher

        private static javax.crypto.Cipher setUpCypher(int cipherMode,
                                               java.security.Key key)
                                        throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Sets up a cypher that allows either to encrypt or decrypt something given either a public or private key
        Parameters:
        cipherMode - = 1 if ENCRYPT_MODE, = 2 DECRYPT_MODE;
        key - key do be used in the process
        Returns:
        the requested cypher
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if an error occurs while cypher is built
        See Also:
        Cipher
